title: Berserker the most powerful AD Champ.
body:
Orc Berserker
HP 523 +132 6.13 +0.74
No MP
AD 53+1.8
Armor 21 +3.1
MR 30+0
Speed 335
Weapon, a large Axe with a pointed spear on top.
Attack Animation, swing, poke.
Crit ANimation, larger swing angle, blood flows from enemy.

Passive: Berserker Strength
Every attack gains 6/7/8/9 bonus damage.
Every 5th attack deals 60/77/96/117 +2% Max HP Bonus TD, resets the bonus damage, and stuns for 0.1/0.2/0.3/0.4 second

Q:Pillaging Strike 9% Current HP on units, 6% Maximum HP on structures. 10/9.4/8.8/8.2/7.6 sec.
Passive: +3/5/7/9/11 TD on basic attacks, tripled for Special attacks.
Next Attack has special Effects.
Units: Attack deals 75% AOE (125) splash damage and 10/13/17/22/28/35% bonus Damage.
On Structures. The Attack lodges the axe in the structure for 2 seconds, then if he is still alive, he will pull the axe out.
Taking out 2/3/4/5/6% of the Towers Max HP +60/100/140/180/230  +65%AD Physical Damage.

W: Berserkers Blood. 19/18/17/16/15 seconds.
Activate to go into a phase of rage. Over 10 seconds, his strength increases per second.
Gaining 30/50/70/90/110AD, 140/250/360/470/580HP healed, Attack speed 20/30/40/50/60% AD, 20/30/40/50/60 Armour and MR, 50/70/90/110/130 Speed  over 10 seconds, gaining 10% of it per second.
After this burst however, Orc Berserker loses 55 Movement speed for the Cooldown which starts after the effects wear off.

E: Blazing Slashes. 6.5% Current HP +4/7/10/13/16 HP per hit. Toggle on, toggle off cooldown 12/11/10/9/8 seconds.
Each hit costs 1.5% +7 HP per hit. Cooldown removes this.
Each hit deals stacking DoT TD.
Each hit deals 3/4/5/6/7 +3%AD TD burn damage for 3 seconds.
Each additional hit stacks 3/5/7/9/11 +3%AD TD burn in addition to the previous stacks and renews burn time.
No Maximum stack. But if no HP left, he will hit the next enemy and be killed by the enemy hit.

R: Gor'Tul's Strength 75% Current HP 100/80/60 sec cooldown.
Orc Berserker gains 300/500/700 AD and 100% Lifesteal for 2/2.5/3seconds. Also enlarges in size and axe, increasing attack range by 125/175/225. Attacks cannot be blocked, dodged and breaks all shields/barriers in 1 strike, even invulnerability.

Where to start...

His passive, the stun alone, on every 5th attack, already surpasses {{champion:111}} , plus all that bonus damage. Build attack speed, and you can stun for a second every 2 seconds at high levels, and have massive damage for free.

His Q just does way too much. Passive true damage/% damage/AoE splash/bonus damage to turrets. With CDR you could use it every 4 seconds or so.

His W, now this is just retarded. AD/heal/AS/Arm-MR/MS. Any one of those 5, as a 10 second buff, would be about right. Not all 5. And the values are too high, even if it were one of the 5. Compare to existing buff abilities.

His E is just a shitload of free damage. The cost in his own HP is easily negated by life leech. This just stacks up with all the other free damage you've given him.

His R is a joke. He one hits anything to heal back to full on each strike, and ignores defenses. This would pentakill in every teamfight.

If you made everything about 20% of what it is now, it would still probably be broken as fuck.
Reminds me of Sion to a degree.
